name: photostat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine used especially in the past to make photographic copies of documents, or a copy made by such a machine

to make a photostat of a document: We like to photostat any useful pieces and circulate them to all the interested groups. It took us 10 days to photostat all 13,000 pages.
More examplesFewer examplesThe diary consists of some 40 odd volumes which we were not able to photostat.He asked me to photostat some papers on my office machine.The machine allows two pages to be photostatted at the same time.
